# Support

## Getting help

- **Questions about using or contributing to Leaf:** Open a [Discussion](https://github.com/NorthernL1ghts/Leaf/discussions).
- **Bug reports:** Open an [issue](https://github.com/NorthernL1ghts/Leaf/issues) and use the bug report template if available.
- **Feature ideas:** Open an [issue](https://github.com/NorthernL1ghts/Leaf/issues) or start a Discussion.

There is no formal support channel beyond this repository. We do not guarantee response times but will do our best to respond to issues and discussions.
